title: Probiotic drinks making @ FHB
abstract: This workshop is about making probiotic drink from a to z. You will get practical experience making your own, tasting samples and getting info from an experienced person.
description:
[To secure spot on this workshop please sign in here.](https://dud-poll.inf.tu-dresden.de/pdm_39c3/)

This an introductory workshop into probiotic brewing, everybody is welcome no one turned away for lack of funds.
